attributes.title: Plastic Messenger Bag
attributes.description:
Created on February 24, 2010 by brkbrk on Sourcemap.org:

Making plastic bag yarn in order to crochet a messenger bag entirely from grocery bags. Hipsters claim to be tree huggin, but can they still be fashionable?

http://www.myrecycledbags.com/2008/04/04/messenger-bag-crafted-from-plastic-bags/
http://www.stanfordalumni.org/news/magazine/sage/200907-2/essential.html

attributes.name: LDPE recycled
attributes.title: LDPE recycled
attributes.description:
Recycled low density polyethylene makes up the fabulous plastic bag.
Were ridin our bike since we are so green.

attributes.name: Ash wood
attributes.title: Ash wood
attributes.description: Solid ash wood used to make the crochet hook, hand-crafted by an Indian woman and shipped to your door with Amazon.com

attributes.name: Bicycle
attributes.title: Bicycle
attributes.description:
We include the bicycle that you use to bring home your plastic bags. But you use it for just about 1000 other things too, so lets divide its weight by 1,000 for .006% of the bicycle being dedicated to the bag. I would include the street too, but its hard to say who else uses it.
 
A basic Trek Road Bicycle with Frameset, Wheels, and Components made by Bontrager Bicycle parts. The Bike weighs around 6 kilograms.  Assemblage takes place at the Trek Factory in Waterloo, WI, USA.
